long_description: Give your best friend a real treat with the REI Classic Dog Pack. It's ideally sized for weekend adventures and equipped for maximum comfort. Nimble saddlebag design moves with dog's body, easing navigation through dense woods and brush. Saddlebag fit is made to minimize load shifting during use and helps improve dog's stability over uneven terrain. Breathable harness combines mesh and padded sections, holds securely to dog and is built to handle rugged usage; 3-point design adapts to various dog shapes. Harness buckles feature a cam lock to eliminate webbing slip even when wet. High-strength aluminum leash ring is easy to grasp while clipping on a leash. Short integrated leash deploys easily from harness grab handle to help guide or hold dog when a longer leash isn't needed or available. Made from tough, 100% post-consumer recycled PET body fabric to resist the abrasion and weather you and your dog encounter.
short_description: Give your best friend a real treat with the REI Classic Dog Pack. It's ideally sized for weekend adventures and equipped for maximum comfort.
